CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper January 9, 1960, pg. 10, reads: "Gay Holiday Affair - The Student Council of Schenley High School sponsored a Christmas dance, 'The Crystal Ball,' recently. It was held in the school gym. Popular singer Chuck Jackson was the guest performer, and music was provided by a local group of musicians. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Schenley High School students dancing during "The Crystal Ball" Christmas dance with band in background, Schenley High School gymnasium
